ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client is currently pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant""Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rubellacontraindications * Tabs: Rubella
Varicella vaccination is contraindicated"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated""Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
Do not vaccinate client with varicella as varicella vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.Do not vaccinate client with varicella as varicella vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.Do not vaccinate client with varicella as varicella vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
The client is planning to get pregnant in the next month"Potential contraindications" = "Planning to get pregnant in the next month""Potential contraindications" = "Planning to get pregnant in the next month" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
Clinical judgement is required. Create clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
Discuss pregnancy intentions, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. It is recommended to delay pregnancy for 4 weeks after vaccination.Discuss pregnancy intentions, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. It is recommended to delay pregnancy for 4 weeks after vaccination.Discuss pregnancy intentions, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. It is recommended to delay pregnancy for 4 weeks after vaccination. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
The client has immune deficiency"Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes""Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Mumpscontraindications * Tabs: Mumps
Varicella vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
Varicella vaccination is usually contraindicated in clients with congenital or acquired immune deficiencies. Consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.Varicella vaccination is usually contraindicated in clients with congenital or acquired immune deficiencies. Consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.Varicella vaccination is usually contraindicated in clients with congenital or acquired immune deficiencies. Consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
The client is immunocompromised"Potential contraindications" = "Immunocompromised""Potential contraindications" = "Immunocompromised" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Denguecontraindications * Tabs: Dengue
Client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider 2 dose schedule.Client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider 2 dose schedule.Client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider 2 dose schedule. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
The client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive"Potential contraindications" = "Exposed to immunosuppressive treatment""Potential contraindications" = "Exposed to immunosuppressive treatment" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella
Client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.Client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.Client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications * Tabs: Varicella

title.value: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications

description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.Varicellacontraindications. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: Do not vaccinate client with varicella as varicella vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.
The client is planning to get pregnant in the next month
Clinical judgement is required. Create clinical note
Discuss pregnancy intentions, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. It is recommended to delay pregnancy for 4 weeks after vaccination.
Varicella vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create clinical note
Varicella vaccination is usually contraindicated in clients with congenital or acquired immune deficiencies. Consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
Client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider 2 dose schedule.
The client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive
Client is receiving or has received medications that may be immunosuppressive, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
